item.description:
Location: The Capitol Building, front steps, Hartford, CT
Time & Date: Saturday, February 27, 2010 12pm-2pm
What to Bring: Your favorite signs from your favorite tea parties!
Attire: Brrr . . . . this is an outdoor event, dress warmly!

One year ago 125 partriots gathered on the steps of the Capital in CT to say we had had enough. On February 27, 2010, across America, it is a rally in celebration of a year of success. Please bring your families, call your radio stations, tell your friends. Everyone is welcome as we continue taking back our country.

PLACE: Hartford State Capitol, front sidewalk, on Capitol Avenue

For parking in Hartford:http://www.hartford.g... .

The Civic Center garage (#1 on the map) may be your best bet; there is also metered parking around Bushnell Park, but check the meters carefully and note the time limits.

Radio stations to call:
WDRC 1360 AM (1-888-574-2723)
WTIC 1080 AM (1-800-966-WTIC)
item.name: One Year Anniversary of the very first Tea Party in Connecticut
